title: Regulation (EEC) No 1491/70 of the Commission of 27 July 1970 amending Regulation (EEC) No 837/68 on detailed rules for the application of levies on sugar
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1491/70 OF THE COMMISSION  of 27 July 1970  amending Regulation (EEC) No 837/68 on detailed rules for the application of levies on sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The words "0.05 u.a." shall be substituted for "0.10 u.a." in Article 5 (2) of Regulation No 837/68.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1970.
For the Commission
The President
